amendment.description: To provide funds available to the Department of Defense to implement the 2018 National Defense Strategy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3293 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 325.

action.text: Amendment SA 3293 proposed by Senator Shelby. (consideration: CR S6214-6215; text: CR S6214-6215) To provide funds available to the Department of Defense to implement the 2018 National Defense Strategy.
